snippet: Israel said that the men were planting a bomb; a Gazan official said the men died after ambulances came under fire and were delayed.
abstract: Three Palestinian men die after being shot by Israeli soldiers near the security fence in the northern border town of Beit Hanoun, bringing to six the number of Gazans killed in military operations over 12 hours; Israel says that the men were planting a bomb; a Gazan official says the men died after ambulances trying to evacuate them came under fire and were delayed.
lead_paragraph: Israel said that the men were planting a bomb; a Gazan official said the men died after ambulances came under fire and were delayed.

headline.main: Israeli Soldiers Kill 3 Palestinians Near Gaza Security Fence
headline.print_headline: Israeli Soldiers Kill 3 Palestinians Near Gaza Security Fence
